author: Miyagawa
title: Low budget extension for a winter village
review:
This is a bit of a budget busting extension for a Winter Village - certainly with just this and a Winter Toy Shop set, it made it feel like I had a complete village just in the first year as it expanded the range sufficiently.

But really, what you've got to remember is that this is just a card stand, two minifigs and enough bricks to make just two toys. You do get interchangable hair so that you can make the child minifig either a girl or a boy though.
